item.title: Publications & Talks
item.description: Publications C F Fleming, N Rhodes and J Van (2019) ‘Development of an injection nozzle retrofit to disrupt the Coanda effect’ in Proc. 18th Int. Symp. on Aerodynamics, Ventilation & Fire in Tunnels, Athens, Greece PIARC Technical Committee D5 (2019) ‘Road Tunnels: Vehicle Emissions and Air Demand for Ventilation’, World Road Association, ISBN 978-2-84060-500-3 C Fleming and N Rhodes (2018) ‘A Validation of the Fire Dynamics Simulator for Smoke Dispersion from Metro Stations’, in Proc.
